name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior HubSpot Engineer, I possess a strong background in leveraging **HubSpot** to create and optimize CRM systems, including the management of **custom objects** and **deal pipelines**. With 8 years of full-stack development experience, I am adept at implementing **API** integrations and automation workflows using tools like **Zapier** and **Workato**. My technical proficiency in **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **SQL** allows me to develop innovative solutions that enhance user experience and data management.

I have a proven track record of building high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors using modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, along with backend technologies like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS** complements my skills in automation and system integration. I am committed to data security and compliance, ensuring that all solutions meet industry standards. Additionally, my familiarity with structured data and third-party tools enhances my ability to deliver comprehensive **workflow** automation solutions.
